## CommentCollection.FindCommentByIdx method

Finds a comment in the collection by index.

```csharp
public IComment FindCommentByIdx(int idx)
```

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| idx | Int32 | Unique index of a comment to find Int32. |
